remarks: Value of map from vectors to functionals with a specific auxiliary vector.  TODO:  Would shorter proofs result if the .ne hypothesis were changed to two ` =/= ` hypothesis?  Consider ~ hdmaplem1 through ~ hdmaplem4 , which would become obsolete.  (Contributed by NM, 15-May-2015.)
statement:
hdmapval2.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
hdmapval2.e $e |- E = <. ( _I |` ( Base ` K ) ) , ( _I |` ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) ) >. $.
